an7.15:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, udakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an7.15:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakim nimuggo nimuggova hoti;
an7.15:1.4: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva nimujjati;
an7.15:1.5: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva thito hoti;
an7.15:1.6: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva vipassati viloketi;
an7.15:1.7: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva patarati;
an7.15:1.8: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva patigadhappatto hoti;
an7.15:1.9: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitva tinno hoti parangato thale titthati brahmano.
an7.15:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakim nimuggo nimuggova hoti?
an7.15:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo samannagato hoti ekantakalakehi akusalehi dhammehi.
an7.15:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sakim nimuggo nimuggova hoti.
an7.15:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:3.6: Tassa sa saddha neva titthati no vaddhati hayatiyeva, tassa sa hiri …pe…
an7.15:3.9: tassa sa panna neva titthati no vaddhati hayatiyeva.
an7.15:3.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva nimujjati.
an7.15:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva thito hoti?
an7.15:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:4.6: Tassa sa saddha neva hayati no vaddhati thita hoti.
an7.15:4.10: tassa sa panna neva hayati no vaddhati thita hoti.
an7.15:4.11: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva thito hoti.
an7.15:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva vipassati viloketi?
an7.15:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:5.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
an7.15:5.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva vipassati viloketi.
an7.15:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:6.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
an7.15:6.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva patarati.
an7.15:7.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva patigadhappatto hoti?
an7.15:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:7.6: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an7.15:7.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva patigadhappatto hoti.
an7.15:8.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva tinno hoti parangato thale titthati brahmano.
an7.15:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sadhu saddha kusalesu dhammesu, sadhu hiri …pe…
an7.15:8.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an7.15:8.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitva tinno hoti parangato thale titthati brahmano.
an7.15:9.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta udakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
